sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: This command adds a label to the y-axis of the plot. The general syntax for its use is ylabel('label') or in the alternate form ylabel 'label' or simply ylabel label You can also specify properties for that label using the syntax ylabel('label',properties...)

sect1.title: Example
sect1.para: Here is an example of a simple plot with a label on the y-axis.
which results in the following plot. ylabel1
